Hero.title: AI Image & Video Generator: Turn Text and Photos Into High-Quality Visuals

Hero.supporting: Generate AI images and videos online in minutes. Free daily credits included.

VideoGallery.description: BestMaker AI offers text-to-video, image-to-video, and hybrid workflows that animate your prompts in seconds. Explore these AI video examples to see how scripts, storyboards, and still photos become dynamic visuals.

WhyChoose.description: BestMaker AI combines an AI image generator, AI video maker, and editing toolkit inside one workspace. Creators, marketers, and studios can go from prompt to publish-ready visuals without switching apps.

CTA.title: Ready to create AI images and videos in one place?
CTA.description: Start using BestMaker AI today to launch text-to-video, image-to-video, and AI photo editing workflows in seconds.

items.question: What is BestMaker AI?
items.answer: BestMaker AI is an online platform that uses AI to generate images and videos from text prompts or uploaded photos. It combines text-to-video, image-to-video, and AI photo editing in one browser workspace.

items.question: Can AI create videos from text?
items.answer: Yes. BestMaker AI includes a text-to-video generator that turns scripts or simple descriptions into complete clips with motion, scenes, and camera movement.

items.question: Can I turn an image into a video?
items.answer: Absolutely. Upload any image and the image-to-video workflow animates it with lighting, motion, and effects to create cinematic shots.

items.question: Does BestMaker AI support image editing?
items.answer: Yes. You can remove objects, change backgrounds, upscale, and create mockups using natural language instructions.

items.question: Does BestMaker AI offer 4K video output?
items.answer: Yes. The platform supports up to 4K AI video rendering so you can deliver marketing-ready footage without additional software.

Footer.description: AI-driven video generation platform, making creation easier.
